Dimension Keeper:
Hello! My name is Spikula, I was awakened by the voice of the Giants, and my mission is their resurrection. Using the power of the runes, for a while I distorted space. In other words, you can instantly move elsewhere. I help these Spikulas, the Giants are looking for a body.
For a small fee I will provide this service and degenerated wars that can use high runes measurements. The money will be used in the purchase of gold to restore the host's body. I recommend you use my teleporter! If you are, of course, is reborn.
